name: Static Fuzz
details:
FuzzThe Static Fuzz is a fuzz that filters through a white noise generator. 
Drive, Volume, Tone and White Noise controls.
4.4" x 2.4" x 1.2" enclosure, true bypass switching, common 9vdc center negative BOSS style power input and battery snap.
Current draw 3.1mA.
http://idiotboxeffects.bigcartel.com/product/static-fuzz
